coreAttributes.name: bat wing barbells
coreAttributes.description: A pair of barbells shaped like bat wings.

displacementText.playerSelf: You slide out the bat wing barbells.
displacementText.playerNPC: You slide out [npc.name]'s bat wing barbells.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You give [npc.name]'s bat wing barbells a tug before sliding them out.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slides the bat wing barbells from your nipples.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] gives your bat wing barbells a tug before sliding them out.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] gives [npc2.name]'s bat wing barbells a tug before sliding them out.

replacementText.playerSelf: You slide the bat wing barbells into place.
replacementText.playerNPC: You slide the bat wing barbells into [npc.name]'s nipples.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You slide the bat wing barbells into [npc.name]'s nipples, giving them a tug.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] slides the bat wing barbells into place.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slides the bat wing barbells into your nipples.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] slides the bat wing barbells into your nipples, giving them a tug.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] slides the bat wing barbells into [npc2.Name]'s nipples.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] slides the bat wing barbells into [npc2.Name]'s nipples, giving them a tug.
